p.s: For godsGod's sake I do not know what I should do.
The plan is good and my wife would be proud but at what costs.
Should I kill the man who made me a Thane.
I do not think so.
But then I would be king.
My wife would be proud.
And to not forget it, the weird sisters also said that I am going to be king.
But this way?
If it goes wrong I am going to be dead and my wife probably too.
But if I am not doing it my honor is broken and I would break a promise.
Do I want to do this?
No.
But also yes.
I do not have much time to think about it.
When the kingKing sleeps and the guards are drunk it is my only chance.
I am going to do it.
Or am I?
Why is it so difficult?
What do I want?
I want to be king.
In order to that I have to kill him.
Or I wait until he dies the proper way.
But then Malcolm becomes king and if he dies then Donald becomes king.
No I cannot wait.
I have to do it now.
My wife was right.
I am going to kill Duncan.
